The miniseries has five episodes of two hours ( may be displayed in ten one-hour episodes ) , each telling two or three passages . Among them , Samson and Delilah , Adam and Eve , the exodus of the Jews and the birth , death and resurrection of Jesus Christ . The actress Roma Downey appears as Mary the mother of Jesus . The production used the New International Version of the Bible , according to the producers , is the most accepted by the Christian community . A committee of theologians and scholars acted as consultant roadmaps .
